verbose_text: Among the factors involved in the signaling pathways of PMA induced MUC5AC and MUC5B expression in the airway epithelial cells, PKCdelta as a novel PKC isoform, was activated by phosphatidylserine, diacylglycerol or PMA.
evidence: PKCdelta as a novel PKC isoform, was activated by phosphatidylserine, diacylglycerol
